overview:
I am a project manager, social media professional, business development and investment specialist with strong analytical skills and strategy expertise, creative, can work under pressure, lead negotiations, able to take responsibility of major decision making.

Completed my MPA from the Voronezh State University (concentration in Public Administration and Management) in July of 2010.

I am always eager to learn and open for new experiences.
